name: Death Horizon: Reloaded
abstract: The Horizon scientific research center is a deceptively quiet place. When you came round, there were hundreds of the living dead all around you.

detail.app_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Japanese, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Korean, Traditional Chinese
detail.app_release_note:
We are delighted to announce that a new game update is now available for download for PICO owners!

In this update, we have added multiplayer, expanded the game’s settings, and implemented numerous game improvements.

New settings:

- Added the possibility to play in sitting mode.
- Introduced a left-handed mode.
- Included the option to change the gun angle.
- Implemented the ability to hold weapons without continuously pressing a button.
- Added the option to turn off blood effects.

Improvements:

- Improved the functionality of melee weapons.
- Improved FPS stability and reduced FPS drops.
- Achieved smoother zombie animations.

If you come across any bugs in the game or have ideas on how we can enhance your gaming experience, please don’t hesitate to reach out to us at info@dream-dev.com.

Best regards,
Horizon Lab
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo2, PICO Neo2 Eye, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
